section.name: Proximity Core
section.p: Proximity Core component is a proxy-like pure Java application. PX Core is transport and environment independent, thus it may serve in J2SE and J2EE application without a problem!.

The PxCore is just a bunch of beans, with dependencies for only the needed transport and storage. Core dependencies are: commons-codec, commons-collections, commons-httpclient and commons-logging (needed by previous components and by Core itself). For detailed deps look here maven dependencies report.
